data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vandenberg, Natalia J. (2011): A revision of the genus Stictobura Crotch and description of a new species of Sticholotis Crotch (Coleoptera: Coccinellidae: Sticholotidinae).
